General.Name: Jingwei Textile Machinery Co Ltd
General.Description: Jingwei Textile Machinery Company Limited engages in the production and sale of textile machinery in China. The company's products portfolio includes spinning, weaving, twisting, and chemical fiber machinery, as well as spare parts. It also engages in the financial trust business; sale of cotton and linen; and provision of dyeing and finishing solutions. Jingwei Textile Machinery Company Limited was founded in 1995 and is based in Beijing, China.
